update.description:
We are planning to use an online collaborative spreadsheet for the next gazebo tutorial review. This PR introduces a script for parsing the manifest.xml and printing info about the tutorials in each category as tab-separated values. It has some default column headers, creates links to the relevant tutorial, and creates 3 rows for each tutorial.

Here's a snippet of its output (prints to std_out):

~~~
Installation
Tutorial name	Assigned to	Issues	Solution	Approved?	OS / Build type
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_ubuntu&cat=install","install_ubuntu")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_ubuntu&cat=install","install_ubuntu")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_ubuntu&cat=install","install_ubuntu")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_other_linux&cat=install","install_other_linux")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_other_linux&cat=install","install_other_linux")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_other_linux&cat=install","install_other_linux")
=HYPERLINK("http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=install_on_mac&cat=install","install_on_mac")
~~~
update.title: Add ruby script to convert manifest.xml to tsv for tutorial party spreadsheets

pullrequest.title: Add ruby script to convert manifest.xml to tsv for tutorial party spreadsheets

content.raw:
FYI, there are 3 tutorials listed under multiple categories:

~~~
$ grep '<tutorial>' manifest.xml  | sort | uniq -c | grep -v '^      1'
      2         <tutorial>aerodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>hydrodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>model_editor</tutorial>
~~~
content.html:
FYI, there are 3 tutorials listed under multiple categories:

$ grep '<tutorial>' manifest.xml  | sort | uniq -c | grep -v '^      1'
      2         <tutorial>aerodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>hydrodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>model_editor</tutorial>
